Footwork.comment: Work on pointing the front foot more towards the target; improves transfer and timing.

Head Position.comment: Keep head over front knee (lower center of gravity) to improve control.

Swing Control.comment: Work on maintaining front elbow elevation for stroke control (drills: shadow front-elbow holds).

Follow-through.comment: Extend follow-through and avoid early upright posture; this helps power & control.
